title: Ticket #271: Allow files received via CEDAR to have mode other than 0600
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Dan changed get_file in CEDAR to take a parameter for what mode to open the file with. He also made the default for this parameter 0644 (where currently the function uses a hardcoded 0600). Obviously, this may have security implications. Perhaps there are some places, however, where using 0644 makes sense and would be more convenient for users.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (22).
